sentences.sContent: Well, only the server can do that.
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, only the server can do that.
sentences.sCn: 嗯，只有服务器能做这项工作。

sentences.sContent: If yes, what are the server specifications?
sentences.sContent_eng: If yes, what are the server specifications?
sentences.sCn: 如果是，服务器的规范是什么？

sentences.sContent: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.sContent_eng: This can be done on any server of the cluster.
sentences.sCn: 可以在集群的任何服务器中这样做。

sentences.sContent: ...and about the same to upgrade to a server that would enable remote staff to connect to the company networks and access all their usual resources...
